==Interactables==
===Soiled Orders===
This interactable is located on the left side of the proving grounds chamber in the underground [[Khaenri'ah]] ruins.

{{Dialogue Start}}
:...As the workshops and related areas are unsuited for large-scale combat operations as carried out by the [[Ruin Golem|Mechanical Wardens]], I order you to activate the self-defense systems and then quickly evacuate the survivors to the surface before continuing to resist...
:...[[Schwanenritter]] Garrison Commander [[Hadura]]...
{{Dialogue End}}
